questions.q: What is Game Shelf?
questions.a:
Game Shelf is a **free app** that tracks all your daily puzzle games (Wordle, Connections, Strands, and 30+ more) in one place. Instead of losing track of streaks or forgetting scores, Game Shelf keeps everything organized automatically.

**Features include:** stats tracking, streak monitoring, AI hints, battles with friends, and shareable summaries.

questions.q: How do I get started?
questions.a:
Three simple steps:

1. **Add games** to your shelf from the Games tab
2. **Play your games** normally on their websites
3. **Record results** by copying share text and tapping Record Game

That's it! Game Shelf handles the rest.

questions.q: Is Game Shelf free?
questions.a: Yes! All core features are **completely free**: tracking, stats, streaks, friends, and battles. Optional coin purchases unlock premium rewards, but you never need to pay.

questions.q: Do I need to create an account?
questions.a: No account required for basic tracking. However, **signing in with Google** unlocks: sync across devices, friends, battles, AI hints, leaderboards, and automatic backup.

questions.q: How does clipboard detection work?
questions.a:
When you return to Game Shelf after playing a puzzle:

1. Game Shelf checks if your clipboard contains a game result
2. If found, it shows a **Tap to Log** card or auto-fills the Record Game sheet
3. Tap to confirm and log

**On Android/Desktop:** This happens automatically in the background.

**On iPhone/iPad:** iOS requires you to tap something first (for privacy), then asks permission to read clipboard.

questions.q: Why does iPhone keep asking to allow paste?
questions.a:
**This is an iOS privacy feature, not a bug.**

Apple requires apps to ask permission every time they read your clipboard. This protects you because clipboards can contain sensitive data (passwords, addresses, etc.).

**What you'll see:**
- A popup asking **"Allow Paste from [Game]?"**
- Tap **Allow** to let Game Shelf read your result

There's no way to "remember" this choiceâ€”iOS asks every time. It's one extra tap, but it keeps your data private.

**Why?** This keeps streaks honestâ€”they reflect actual daily play, not backfilled data.

**Tip:** Enable notifications or set a daily reminder to record your games before midnight!

questions.q: How do streaks work?
questions.a:
A **streak** counts how many consecutive days you've played a specific game.

**How it works:**
- Day 1: Play Wordle â†’ Streak = 1
- Day 2: Play Wordle â†’ Streak = 2
- Day 3: Miss â†’ Streak resets to 0
- Day 4: Play Wordle â†’ Streak = 1 (starts over)

**Key rules:**
- Each game has its **own separate streak**
- Missing Wordle doesn't affect your Connections streak
- Playing twice in one day doesn't count for the next day
- Your **max streak** (best ever) is always saved

questions.q: What's the difference between Current Streak and Max Streak?
questions.a:
**Current Streak** = Your active consecutive days right now. Resets to 0 if you miss a day.

**Max Streak** = Your all-time best. Never decreases, even when current streak resets.

**Example:**
- You build a 45-day streak, then miss a day
- Current Streak â†’ 0
- Max Streak â†’ still 45 (your record)
- You start again, reach 30 days
- Current Streak â†’ 30
- Max Streak â†’ still 45

questions.q: Why did my streak reset?
questions.a:
Streaks reset when you **miss a calendar day**. Common causes:

| Cause | What happened |
|-------|---------------|
| **Didn't play** | Simply forgot to play that game |
| **Played but didn't record** | Played but didn't log in Game Shelf |
| **Recorded after midnight** | Logged it but the day had changed |
| **Timezone confusion** | Traveled or device clock was wrong |

**Your max streak is preserved**â€”only current streak resets.

**Fix:** If your actual game streak is higher, use **Import Stats** to sync it.

questions.q: What time do streaks reset?
questions.a:
**Midnight in your local timezone.**

You have until 11:59 PM to record that day's game. At 12:00 AM, a new day begins.

**Important distinction:**
- **Game reset time** (when new puzzle appears) varies by gameâ€”Wordle resets at midnight Eastern
- **Game Shelf streak time** is based on YOUR device's timezone

So if you're in California and play "today's Wordle" at 11 PM PT, it counts for that day in Game Shelf.

questions.q: How do streaks work when I travel across time zones?
questions.a:
Game Shelf uses your **device's current timezone**, which changes when you travel.

**What this means:**
- Flying east â†’ Your day gets shorter (less time to play)
- Flying west â†’ Your day gets longer (more time)
- Crossing the date line â†’ Could skip or repeat a calendar day

**Example problem:**
- It's 11 PM Monday in New York, you haven't played
- You fly to London (5 hours ahead)
- You land and it's now 4 AM Tuesdayâ€”Monday is gone, streak broken

**Best practice:**
- **Record games before you travel**
- Play early on travel days
- Don't rely on "I'll do it when I land"

**Fix:** Go back to game, tap Share, return to Game Shelf immediately, tap Record Game.

questions.q: Why does iOS keep asking "Allow Paste?"
questions.a:
This is an **Apple privacy feature**, not a bug.

On iPhone/iPad, apps cannot secretly read your clipboard. iOS asks permission **every time**.

**What to do:**
- Tap **"Allow"** when prompted
- If you tap "Don't Allow," close Game Shelf, copy again, and retry

**This is normal** - it protects your privacy by preventing apps from reading sensitive copied data without permission.

questions.q: Why did my streak reset?
questions.a:
Streaks reset when you **miss a day**. Common reasons:

| Cause | Explanation |
|-------|-------------|
| Forgot to play | Check your history for gaps |
| Forgot to record | Playing isn't enough - must record in Game Shelf |
| Timezone travel | Day boundaries shift when you travel |
| Recording error | Result didn't save properly |

**Check:** Stats â†’ By Game â†’ find the game â†’ view history to see any gaps.

questions.q: When exactly do streaks reset?
questions.a:
**Midnight in YOUR local timezone.**

- Based on your device's clock
- Not based on when the game resets (Wordle resets at midnight ET)
- Playing at 11:59 PM still counts for that day

**Traveling?** Your device timezone affects which "day" your play counts for. Record before traveling if you're concerned.

questions.q: The app is running slowly or freezing.
questions.a:
**Try these fixes in order:**

1. **Refresh** - Pull down or restart the app
2. **Clear cache** - Menu â†’ Advanced â†’ Clear Cache
3. **Restart device** - Full device restart
4. **Reinstall** - Remove from home screen, reinstall from browser

**PWA stuck on old version?** Menu â†’ Advanced â†’ Force Update

**Still slow?** Report via Menu â†’ Help â†’ Feedback with your device info.

questions.q: My data disappeared!
questions.a:
**If signed in:**
- Sign out and sign back in
- Data should restore from cloud

**If NOT signed in:**
- Local-only data can be lost when clearing browser data
- Unfortunately, this cannot be recovered
- **Always sign in** to prevent future data loss

**Signed in but still missing?** Check you're using the correct Google account.

questions.q: AI Hints aren't working.
questions.a:
**Requirements for hints:**

| Requirement | How to Check |
|-------------|--------------|
| Signed in | Menu â†’ Account |
| 5+ tokens | Menu â†’ Wallet |
| Under rate limit | Wait if you've used many hints |
| Internet connection | Check your connection |

**Rate limits:** 20 hints/hour, 50 hints/day

**Error message?** "Rate limit exceeded" means wait an hour. "Insufficient tokens" means earn or buy more.

questions.q: My battle scores aren't updating.
questions.a:
**Checklist:**

1. **Game recorded?** Check if result appears in your Stats
2. **Battle game?** Must be one of the games selected for this battle
3. **Battle active?** Confirm battle hasn't ended yet
4. **Refresh** - Pull down on battle details screen

**Scores update** when you record games. If you recorded but it's not showing, wait a moment and refresh.

questions.q: I can't join a battle.
questions.a:
**Common reasons:**

| Issue | Solution |
|-------|----------|
| Battle full | Join a different battle |
| Battle ended | Find an active one |
| Invalid code | Check spelling of invite code |
| Not enough tokens/coins | Check your balance |
| Not signed in | Sign in first |

**Need the code?** Ask the battle creator to resend the invite link.

questions.q: Sound effects aren't playing.
questions.a:
**Check these:**

1. **Device not muted** - Check your phone's mute switch/volume
2. **Sound enabled** - Menu â†’ Settings â†’ Sound Effects (toggle on)
3. **iOS specific** - Tap anywhere in the app first to enable audio

**Still no sound?** Try closing and reopening the app, or reinstalling.

questions.q: The app seems stuck on an old version.
questions.a:
**For PWA (installed to home screen):**

1. Menu â†’ Advanced â†’ **Force Update Check**
2. If that doesn't work: Close app completely, reopen
3. Last resort: Uninstall PWA, revisit gameshelf.co, reinstall

**Check version:** Menu â†’ scroll to bottom â†’ see version number

**Desktop:** Try hard refresh (Ctrl+Shift+R or Cmd+Shift+R)

questions.q: How do I contact support?
questions.a:
**Options:**

1. **In-app:** Menu â†’ Help â†’ Feedback
2. **Email:** support@gameshelf.co

**Include in your message:**
- Device type (iPhone, Android, Desktop)
- Browser (Safari, Chrome, etc.)
- What happened (steps to reproduce)
- Screenshots if possible

**Response time:** Usually within 24-48 hours.

questions.q: What data does Game Shelf collect?
questions.a:
**Data collected:**

| Data | Purpose |
|------|---------|
| Email & name | Account identification |
| Profile photo | Display to friends |
| Game results | Your stats tracking |
| Device info | Debugging, analytics |

**NOT collected:**
- Passwords (handled by Google)
- Contacts
- Location
- Other apps
- Your actual puzzle answers (just scores)

questions.q: Who can see my data?
questions.a:
**Friends can see:**
- Your display name and photo
- Which games you played today
- Your scores (e.g., "Wordle 4/6")
- Your current streaks
- Leaderboard position

**Friends CANNOT see:**
- Your token/coin balance
- Your email address
- Your detailed settings
- Your actual puzzle answers

**Public:** Only visible in public battles (name, photo, scores).

questions.q: Can I export or download my data?
questions.a:
**Currently:** No self-service export feature.

**To request your data:**
- Email support@gameshelf.co
- Subject: "Data Export Request"
- Include your account email

**GDPR/CCPA requests** are honored. We'll provide your data within 30 days.

**Future:** Self-service export is planned.

questions.q: How do I delete all my data?
questions.a:
**Delete your account** to remove all data:

1. Menu â†’ Account
2. Scroll to bottom
3. Tap "Delete Account"
4. Confirm

**This permanently removes:**
- All stats, history, streaks
- Friends connections
- Tokens and coins
- Your profile

**Cannot be undone.** Consider signing out instead if you might return.

questions.q: Is my data secure?
questions.a:
**Security measures:**

| Protection | Details |
|------------|---------|
| **Encrypted transit** | Data encrypted when sent |
| **Secure storage** | Stored in Firebase (Google Cloud) |
| **No passwords** | Google handles authentication |
| **Limited access** | Only you and friends (limited) see your data |

**We never:**
- Sell your data
- Share with advertisers
- Access your other accounts

**Concerns?** Contact support@gameshelf.co
